name: claude-plugins
description: Curated collection of Claude Code plugins: third-party MCP integrations and custom development tools.

plugins.name: ralph-loop
plugins.description: Continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development, implementing the Ralph Wiggum technique.

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation and end-to-end testing MCP server by Microsoft.

plugins.name: github
plugins.description: Official GitHub MCP server for repository management.

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack workspace integration for searching messages and staying connected with team communications.

plugins.name: stripe
plugins.description: Stripe development plugin with best practices, test card references, and error code explanations.

plugins.name: supabase
plugins.description: Supabase MCP integration for database operations, authentication, storage, and real-time subscriptions.

plugins.name: firebase
plugins.description: Google Firebase MCP integration for Firestore, authentication, cloud functions, hosting, and storage.

plugins.name: context7
plugins.description: Upstash Context7 MCP server for up-to-date documentation lookup.

plugins.name: serena
plugins.description: Semantic code analysis MCP server for intelligent code understanding and refactoring.

plugins.name: greptile
plugins.description: AI code review agent for GitHub and GitLab.
